strapiPost.title: Razorbacks complete sweep of the state of Mississippi with win over Ole Miss
strapiPost.content:
The Razorbacks beat Ole Miss 33 - 21 coming away with the team's 2nd (or 3rd depending on who's keeping count) win of the season. The Hogs' defense should be credited for an outstanding game. Not only did they hold the Rebels to just 21 points, but they had 6 interceptions on a great QB that had only thrown 1 pick the entire season.

  • Grant Morgan had 19 tackles and 1 pick six
  • Redshirt Freshman Hudson Clark had 3 interceptions
  • Jalen Catalon had a pick six and a fumble recovery
  • The defense came up with two stops at the goal line

In just 4 games, Sam Pittman's Razorbacks have revived the Arkansas fan base and generated a buzz about the team nationwide. It's starting to feel like the fans can once again sing "It's hard to be humble when you're an Arkansas Razorback fan!" with conviction.
